```{r}
df <- read.csv("output_new.csv")
df$phase <-factor(df$phase)
df
```
```{r}
df$phase <- relevel(df$phase, ref = 4)
mod <- lm(len_data ~ phase, df)
summary(mod)
```

```{r}
mod <- lm(len_40 ~ phase, df)
summary(mod)
```

```{r}
mod <- lm(novelty ~ phase, df)
summary(mod)
```
